jaina:ArcaneGatePower.NAME: Arcane Gate
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal %d damage whenever you play an #pArcane card.

jaina:ArcticArmorPower.NAME: Arctic Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain %d Block whenever you play a #bFrost card.

jaina:CombustionPower.NAME: Combustion
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn, this creature loses #b%d HP.

jaina:EvocationPower.NAME: Evocation
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b%d #ySpelldamage.

jaina:FlameWardPower.NAME: Flame Ward
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are attacked, apply #b%d #rCombustion to the attacker.

jaina:FrostAffinityPower.NAME: Frost Affinity
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #yFrost card you play costs #b2 less this turn.

jaina:FrozenPower.NAME: Frozen
DESCRIPTIONS: Stilled by ice and may not act. This effect can NOT stack.

jaina:IceBlockPower.NAME: Ice Block
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the next instance of lethal damage you would take.

jaina:IncantersPower.NAME: Incanter's Flow
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each turn costs 0.
The first %d cards you play each turn cost 0.

jaina:LoseSpellDamagePower.NAME: Spell Force Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b%d #ySpell #yForce.

jaina:ManaBindPower.NAME: Mana Bind
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #yArcane card is played twice this turn.
Your next #b%d #yArcane cards are played twice this turn.

jaina:SpellDamagePower.NAME: Spell Force
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases the effect of certain spell cards by #b%d.

jaina:SplittingImagePower.NAME: Splitting Image
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d #yIntangible after being attacked.

jaina:VaporizePower.NAME: Vaporize
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are attacked, deal that much damage to the attacker. Reduced by #b1 for each incoming hit.
Vaporize+

jaina:WildfirePower.NAME: Wildfire
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #rCombustion, apply #b3 more.
Wildfire+
Whenever you apply #rCombustion, apply #b2x as much.

jaina:WizardArmorPower.NAME: Wizard Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b%d #yBlock.
